Text.Page:
I was gathering herbs with my dad, and we got separated. Then the {@LinkCreature:16#2209#gloomtusks} attacked, so I ran and hid.

My dad must be so worried. Do you think you could take care of those animals for me? Just enough to clear the path, so I can find my dad?

That was so fast!

I hate to think of my dad worrying about meâ€”do you think we could go find him right now? Please?
